**Security Ratings Services**
=====================================================

**Tender Reference Information**
-----------------------------

* **RFx002378**: Solicitation Number
* **Date of Publication**: October 19, 2023
* **Closing Date**: November 13, 2023 (14:00 EST)
* **Solicited Country**: Canada

**Notice Type and Procurement Method**
----------------------------------

* **Type of Notice**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity Information**
-------------------------------

* **Name**: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
* **Address**: 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1L 8K5, Canada

**Notice Summary**
------------------

Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of security ratings services to support the organization's risk management and compliance activities. The successful Proponent will be awarded a contract for a three-year period, with the option to extend for two additional years.

**Service Requirements**
-----------------------

The proposed security ratings service(s) will provide a third-party, independent view of security behaviors and practices within CMHC's operations and its business partners. The service is expected to:

* Assess and evaluate the organization's security posture
* Provide recommendations for improving security behaviors and practices
* Conduct regular security ratings and assessments

**Formal Submission Requirements**
--------------------------------

To be considered for this contract opportunity, interested suppliers must submit their proposals, including all supporting documentation, by the closing date specified above. The RFP document, as well as a Q&A document, can be found on the following websites:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22427/rfx002378-security-rating-services-rfp-oct-17-23.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22427/rfx002378-qas-rfp-security-ratings-services-nov.3-23-eng.pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22427/rfx002378-des-services-devaluation-de-la-securite-ddp-18-oct-23_fr.pdf (French)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22427/rfx002378---questions-et-reponses-3-nov.-23.pdf (English)
